reviewText: hillarious! Period. Your sides will hurt from laughing. Can't wait for bert to make another movie to laugh to. Thanks

This is a very funny guy.  i first saw him perform on comedy central and decided to buy the dvd on amazon which was advertised at the end of the show.  it was well worth it and i watch it whenever im down because it will guarantee to life my spirits!
Some pretty hilarious jokes and some were just ok.  The hilarious ones though were laugh out loud, tears to my eyes.
i just caught his standup on tv, and he was super funny!!..i couldn't stop laughing. a must buy you won't be sorry! he's that good! too bad nobody is pushing more of this guy!
Wish I'd just rented it. This is a very early piece and not his best. Go for the newer routines for sure! Still funny, but not really worth the purchase. I still love Bert though!
Awesome special but only one real question. Why is Bert so fat? I mean he's funny but way too fat.

Bert is one of the funniest people of our generation.  the best part about it is that all he gives us are true stories of his life, thoughts and experiences.  I would love to read more by him.  For now I'll settle on listening to his podcast "Bertcast."
Bert Kreischer never fails to deliver a stomach wrenching laugh. Love him!
One of the best stand up comedy performances ever. Hilarious
If you have a chance, go see Bert live!!  You have to hear the Machine Story in person, it is amazing.  Hopefully we'll get a new stand up special soon!
One of the best stand ups I've seen! Probably one of the top ten I have seen. Funny funny funny!
I never really heard of him before Bert the Conqueror . His stand up wasn't asfunny as I was expecting.
